thethorton:BottledFunds.NAME: Bottled Funds
DESCRIPTIONS: Upon pickup, choose a card in your deck. At the start of each combat, play and #yExhaust a copy of it.

thethorton:BankDeed.NAME: Bank Deed
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you climb a floor, gain #b2% interest on held #yGold.

thethorton:BusinessCardPrinter.NAME: Business Card Printer
thethorton:BusinessCardPrinter.FLAVOR: Look at that subtle off-white color. The tasteful thickness of it. Oh my God, it even has a watermark.
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of each combat, add a #ythethorton:Business_Card into your hand.

thethorton:CrushedCigarette.NAME: Lucky Clover
DESCRIPTIONS: #b66% chance to gain [E] at the start of your turn.

thethorton:BrokenCalculator.NAME: Broken Calculator
thethorton:BrokenCalculator.FLAVOR: So what if the math's in my favor?
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of each combat, play a random Thorton card.

thethorton:Resume.NAME: Resume
thethorton:Resume.FLAVOR: Graduate of the University of Arizona.
DESCRIPTIONS: The amount of #ythethorton:Business_Cards required to obtain a #yRelic is reduced by #b3.

thethorton:StoneOfSprinting.NAME: Helm of Sprinting
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of each combat, add a random card with #ythethorton:Run into your hand. It costs #b0 this combat.

thethorton:TimeNecklace.NAME: Necklace of Time
DESCRIPTIONS: .[] NL Start each Elite combat with #b3 #yStrength, #b3 #yDexterity and #b3 #yFocus.
